channel.title: SoftLayer_Network_Monitor_Version1_Query_ResponseType on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Network_Monitor_Version1_Query_ResponseType on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Monitor_Version1_Query_ResponseType
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Monitor_Version1_Query_ResponseType Datatype Description The ResponseType type stores only an ID and a description of the response type. The only use for this object is in reference. The user chooses a response action that would be appropriate for a monitoring instance, and sets the ResponseTypeId to the SoftLayer_Network_Monitor_Version1_Query_Host->responseActionId value. The user can retrieve all available ResponseTypes with the getAllObjects method on this service. Local actionDescription The description of the action the monitoring system will take on failure Type: string
